ctx: intros f g a b pr_f pr_g pr.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of RiemannInt_P26 (RiemannInt _ + RiemannInt _) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros f g a b pr_f pr_g pr.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R a, b : R pr_f : Riemann_integrable f a b pr_g : Riemann_integrable g a b pr : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x - g x) a b Unable to unify "(let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr_f RinvN RinvN_cv in a0) - (let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr_g RinvN RinvN_cv in a0)" with "let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr RinvN RinvN_cv in a0".

original: intros f g a b pr_f pr_g pr. unfold RiemannInt. rewrite RiemannInt_P26. reflexivity.
